# 8-Bit Signed Integer Vectors

**API Collection**

Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 8-bit integer elements.

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_char1**: A vector of one 8-bit signed integer element.
- **simd_char2**: A vector of two 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_char3**: A vector of three 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_char4**: A vector of four 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_char8**: A vector of eight 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_char16**: A vector of sixteen 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_char32**: A vector of thirty-two 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_char64**: A vector of sixty-four 8-bit signed integer elements.

## Packed Vector Data Types

- **simd_packed_char2**: A packed vector of two 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_char4**: A packed vector of four 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_char8**: A packed vector of eight 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_char16**: A packed vector of sixteen 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_char32**: A packed vector of thirty-two 8-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_char64**: A packed vector of sixty-four 8-bit signed integer elements.

## Signed Integer Vectors

- **16-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 16-bit integer elements.
- **32-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 32-bit integer elements.
- **64-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 64-bit integer elements.
